basics.name: Evgenii Kolodin
basics.label: Junior Developer
basics.summary: Graduate engineer with partial PhD and master-equvalent degree looking for a junior developer position. Breaked up with science activity in 2022. Haven't any commercial development experience, but have a pet-projects using Python and C++. Familiar with technologies such as Flask and Dash web frameworks, also Qt5 and tkinter libraries. Passed web-development courses on python, perl and go in 2016-2017. Looking to grow as a backend or full-stack python web developer opportunity.

work.name: National Research Nuclear University MEPhI
work.summary: Was doing radiation safety calculations using FLUKA and GEANT4 Monte-Carlo frameworks.

work.name: OECD Nuclear Energy Agency (NEA)
work.position: Intern at the RWMD Scientific Secretariat
work.summary: Internship in Radioactive Waste Management Committee. Contributed to the scientific conferences organisation process.

program.specialization: Atomic Nuclear Plants: design, exploitation and decommissioning
Nuclear power installations, including design, operation and decommissioning

projects.name: Space Invaders Game
projects.description: Game based on Space Invaders atari classic, made as a part of c++ development course provided by mail.ru group company.
projects.summary: Game based on Space Invaders Atari classic, made as a part of C++ development course provided by mail.ru group company.

projects.name: Phantom-Pose
projects.description: Changing pose of a human voxel model (phantom) anatomically for the radiation protection purposes.
projects.summary: Specialist diploma project. Changing pose of a human voxel model (phantom) anatomically for the radiation protection purposes.

projects.name: Turtle Translator
projects.description: Application to translate english voice to russian text in real-time. It uses a bit modified speech_recognition library with Google Speech Recognition API for recognition speach stream and MyMemory API for text translation.
projects.summary: Application to translate english voice to russian text in real-time. It uses a bit modified speech_recognition library with Google Speech Recognition API for recognition speach stream and MyMemory API for text translation.

projects.name: Anadet
projects.description: Web application for handle and depict results from GEANT4 output .csv files using Dash plotly web framework
projects.summary: Web application for handle and depict results from GEANT4 output .csv files using Dash plotly web framework. Part of my scientific research in nuclear physics area. Deployed with NGINX web-server and uwsgi http://koon.fvds.ru.

projects.name: OxyPar
projects.description: Proxy parser using scrapy python framework
projects.summary: Console application for parse proxies from various sources using scrapy python framework.

projects.name: LinkManager
projects.description: API for creating a Link Manager Application
projects.summary: Web Application using FastAPI python framework and AWS services for creating a LinkManager endpoints.
